00001 #include "SimPlugins/UserActionPluginMessenger.h"
00002 
00003 namespace ldmx {
00004 
00005     UserActionPluginMessenger::UserActionPluginMessenger(UserActionPlugin* userPlugin) :
00006             userPlugin_(userPlugin) {
00007 
00008         pluginDir_ = new G4UIdirectory(std::string("/ldmx/plugins/" + userPlugin->getName() + "/").c_str());
00009         pluginDir_->SetGuidance(std::string("Commands for the sim plugin " + userPlugin->getName()).c_str());
00010 
00011         verboseCmd_ = new G4UIcommand(std::string(getPath() + "verbose").c_str(), this);
00012         G4UIparameter* verbose = new G4UIparameter("verboseLevel", 'i', false);
00013         verboseCmd_->SetParameter(verbose);
00014         verboseCmd_->SetGuidance("Set the verbosity level of the sim plugin (1-4).");
00015         verboseCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit, G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00016     }
00017 
00018     void UserActionPluginMessenger::SetNewValue(G4UIcommand *command, G4String newValue) {
00019         if (command == verboseCmd_) {
00020             userPlugin_->setVerboseLevel(std::atoi(newValue));
00021             std::cout << userPlugin_->getName() << " verbose set to " << userPlugin_->getVerboseLevel() << std::endl;
00022         }
00023     }
00024 } // namespace sim
